original_text: He was speaking about Judas, the son of Simon Iscariot. Judas was one of the 12 apostles, but later he would sell Jesus to Jesus' enemies.
korean_text: 이 말씀은 가룟 시몬의 아들 유다를 가리키심이라 그는 열둘 중의 하나로 예수를 팔 자러라

sentences.original_text: Judas was one of the 12 apostles
but later he would sell Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나중에 그는 예수를 팔 것이다
